# ghr

The goal of ghr is to get and manipulate a GitHub API response.

## Installation

``` R
install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("maurolepore/ghr")
```

## Example

This is a basic example which shows you how to solve a common problem:

```{r example}
library(ghr)
```
